page.title: 17PERSONAL VIEW
page.content: I like the friendly nature of the village community, especially the village shop and school. I miss not having many girl friends my own age living close by. I dislike litter left by thoughtless people and heavy vehicles travelling through the village especially at the sharp bend near my house. For the future I hope the village school will remain open and the church be used more, perhaps for Sunday School. I hope that the trees and hedgerows remain untouched to encourage wild life. Finally I like to think that when I grow up I can find employment in the area.
